geral.label: Module License and MercadoLivre Account
geral.comment: Thirdlevel's module license and settings related to your MercadoLivre application and account. See Additional Information

magento.label: Store
magento.comment: The Store where MercadoLivre orders will be placed. See Additional Information

default.label: Default Options for New Listings
default.comment: Select the default options/values for new listings. These settings are specially important for bulk listing creations. See Additional Information

exclude_regions_freeshipping.label: Excluir Regiões Norte e Nordeste para Frete Grátis

item.label: Stock Management and Updates
item.comment: Configure how store's products updates should reflect on your listings and if MercadoLivre orders should update your store's stock. See Additional Information

no_manage_stock.label: Store with Unlimited Stock
no_manage_stock.comment: Select 'Yes' if you want to ignore your store's stock and list your product with the maximum allowed quantity.

auto_decrement_store_stock.label: Decrease Store's Stock Upon Sale on MercadoLivre

increment_or_decrement_percent.label: Percentage will decrement or increment the price?

close_pause.label: Action to Perform When Store's Stock Reaches Zero

smart_stock.label: Enable Smart Stock
smart_stock.comment: Warning: This is a beta feature. If you decide to use it, do the appropriate tests.

smart_stock_qtd.label: Maximum Quantity
smart_stock_qtd.comment: If not set, the default quantity will be 2

auto_update_mercadolivre_qtd.label: Update Quantity
auto_update_mercadolivre_qtd.comment: Warning: When an item's quantity reaches 0 (zero) on MercadoLivre, the listing will be closed.

auto_updated_price.label: Update Price
auto_updated_price.comment:
Price update will follow this order of priority:
1st - MercadoLivre Product Price,
2nd - Product Special Price,
3rd - Product Price

allow_description_change.label: Allow Description Change for Items with Sales

melienvios.label: MercadoEnvios 1 (me1)
melienvios.comment: Settings for MercadoEnvios 1 (me1). See Additional Information

mletiquetas.label: MercadoEnvios 2 (me2)
mletiquetas.comment:
In case you have Melienvios 2 (or simply Melienvios) (ie. if you print the labels for your packages), you must set 'Yes' for the 'Store Uses Mercadoenvios 2 (me2)' option bellow.
Note: Your store cannot use Me1 and Me2 simultaneously. Check thislink for more information.

shipping.label: Other Shipping
shipping.comment: Choose the default shipping module to be used when your store does not use Melienvios. See Additional Information

shippingmethod.label: Shipping Module
shippingmethod.comment: Choose the default shipping module to put in your order when the buyer has manualy informed the shipping cost at Mercadolivre, or chose, 'to be agree'

default_service.label: Mercadolivre Shipping Service
default_service.comment: Choose one Mercadolivre Service to automatic post Tracking Code when the buyer has informed the shipping cost at MercadoLivre

payment.label: Store Checkout, Order Statuses and Order Completion
payment.comment:
Settings related to the payments accepted on your store, the order statuses and order's finishing.
These fields are specially important if customers need to choose procuts variations after putting the order on MercadoLivre or if you accept payment methods other than MercadoPago. See More Information

send_welcome_email_new_customer.label: Send Login and Password for New Customers
send_welcome_email_new_customer.comment: If set to yes, when a customer from MercadoLivre purchases something from your store, an e-mail will be sent with its login credentials.

send_email_customer.label: Send E-mails to Customers
send_email_customer.comment:
Only Select 'No' with you don't want the store to send e-mails to the customer
Attention:Incomplete Orders will not be Generate.

receive_email_copy.label: Receive Copy of Sent E-mails (BCC)
receive_email_copy.comment: Insert one e-mail to receive a bbc copy of the e-mails sent for the clients (optional)

heading_positive_feedback.label: Automatic Positive Feedback for Approved Payments

auto_give_feedback.label: Automatic Positive Feedback
auto_give_feedback.comment: Auto Give FeedBack on Approved and Paid Orders

feedback_message.label: FeedBack Text for Approved and Paid Orders
feedback_message.comment: To be used on Mercadlivre Orders only when was not paid by MercadoPago , and the payment is "To be agree with the Seller"

order_status_new.label: Status for New Orders
order_status_new.tooltip: If you wish, go to System -> Order Statuses, create a new status with the name you wish and assign the state 'new' to this status.

paymentmethod.label: Payment Methods Accepted for MercadoLivre Orders Completed in Store
paymentmethod.comment: Use [CTRL] to SELECT more than one payment method to be excluded or DESELECT a payment method.

auto_create_invoice.label: Autocreate Invoice
auto_create_invoice.comment: Select 'Yes' in case you want to create invoices automatically for paid orders

classificado.label: Classifieds
classificado.comment: Information used for classified listings (eg. houses, cars, etc). See Additional Information

classificado_store_uses.label: Listings are Posted on Classified Section

qualification.label: Auto Cancelation for Uncompleted Orders
qualification.comment: Settings related to uncompleted orders (eg. orders not payed). See Additional Information

enable_auto_cancelation_not_completed.label: Enable Automatic Cancelation for Uncompleted Orders

days_before_auto_cancelation.label: Days to Wait Before Cancel Order (Mininum of 2 Days)
days_before_auto_cancelation.comment: Default is 6 days when not set

auto_feedback_text.label: Text for the automatic feedback of canceled orders

field_customization.label: Field Mapping and Customization
field_customization.comment:
If you need to save customer data in fields other than Magento's default, use this section to map the required fields.
Beware: Mapping fields incorrectly may cause inconsistency on your database. See More Information

implement_own_class.label: Implement your own class to handle customer data

default_neighborhood.label: Default Neighborhood for Orders
default_neighborhood.comment: It will be inserted as Address Line 4

product_brand.label: Product Brand Field
product_brand.comment: Type the name of the field you use for your product's brand

product_ean.label: Product EAN (Bar Code) Field
product_ean.comment: Type the name of the field you use for your product's EAN

use_youtube_link.label: Send YouTube Video Link to MercadoLivre

product_youtube_video_link.label: YouTube Link Field
product_youtube_video_link.comment: Type the name of the field you use for your product's YouTube video link

custom_document_field.label: Custom Field to Save Buyer's Document Number

add_cost_table.label: Add Product Cost to Magento Order

log.label: Enable Calls Log
log.comment: In order for this setting to work it is necessary that configuration > advanced > Log Setting is Enable. The log files are located in {{base_dir}}/var/thirdlevel_call.log

log_debug.label: Enable Debug Log
log_debug.comment: Only to be used when advised by ThirdLevel.

log_detailed.label: Enable Detailed Log
log_detailed.comment: Only to be used when advised by ThirdLevel. Beware: When enabled, a loss of performance is expected.

no_cron.label: Process Notifications Only with CronJob
no_cron.comment: If your Magento store has no CronJob configured, select 'No' so notifications are processed every time a new one arrives. If use CronJob, the notifications will be processed every minute.

no_line.label: Process Notifications in Real Time
no_line.comment: Select Yes, if you don't want to wait to process the notifications, be aware that this will increase the number of notification processed and cause email send incorrectly to customers

max_notification_per_time.label: Number of Notifications to Be Processed Simultaneously
max_notification_per_time.comment: Beware: Changes to this setting my have impact on your store's performance. If left blank, 50 notifications will be processed

delete_notification_time.label: Days to Wait Before Deleting Failed Notifications from the Queue
delete_notification_time.comment: If no value is given, notification will be deleted after 6 days. Insert 0 if you never want the failed notification to be deleted

fields.norequest: Disable Pending Requests Queue select adminhtml/system_config_source_yesnos 120 1 0 0

max_image_custom.label: Maximum Number of Pictures for Classifieds
max_image_custom.comment: Use it only if you're posting on Mercadolivre's Classifieds Section

category_filter.label: Disable Category and Listing Count Filter in Listing Creation
category_filter.comment: Disable this, will improve performance on 'Create Listing', but will make lose the features to sort by category

title.label: Title
title.comment: The name that will appear at MercadoLivre paid orders
